name: Open Web Calendar
description: Embed a web calendar into your own website.

APP_DEBUG.description: Whether to use debug mode to run the app (true/false). It defaults to true.

CACHE_REQUESTED_URLS_FOR_SECONDS.description: To speed up loading time, the requests to urls can be cached. This also delays displaying updates.

WORKERS.description: How many workers should run in parallel to work on requests.

OWC_SPECIFICATION.description: JSON or YAML content to alter the specification of all calendars.
